name: Icy Pillars
desc:
You cause four 5 foot tall, 20 pound jagged pillars of ice to spring up at a target empty space. Creatures you choose that are adjacent to it must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 cold damage.

The pillars have 5 hit points and AC 10. They obstruct movement into the space until they are all destroyed.
empower: You target two empty spaces. A creature can only take damage from this spell once.
author: CrusaderDroid
